channel.title: [317] Pk Planet [317] Many minigames uploaded,(Pk System,21k+ View!)
channel.description:
Hi, My first release, I want to release this server because i played on it and let people play on it, but i never got a Vps So i want to release it...
What does pk planet have?
100% Working Barrows 100% Working Godwars Fully working Assualt Fully working pest control Fight Pits Working! Working d clawz spec (4 hits :)) Working Slayer 95% Working Veng 100% Prayer Works 100%(It includes Chivalry and Piety) Real dragon plate body (like the one in RuneScape, Not glitched) Working Summoing Cape(Not Glitched) Working Emotes 97%
Players Command
::pkrewardz ::mypks ::chekpoints (name) ::kbd ::skillz ::wc ::kq ::home ::greendrags ::war ::farming ::male ::female ::rules ::commands ::donating ::staff
Owners Commands
::vent ::unipmute ::unipban ::add (Add player name to Donator list) ::message ::object ::givemod ::giveadmin ::ownerwear
Admins Commands
::pickup ::banuser ::jail ::unjail ::master ::mute ::unmute ::emote ::ipmute ::adminwear
Mods Commands
::tank (Gives 99def) ::mute ::ipmute ::jail ::unjail ::xteleto ::food
Here are some pictures ;)

Credits : Blurr ME My friends reverce (combattscape) Thanks you for reading my post:), Have a Nice day
- Owner Bashar

hope you help =)
